pageContext.claim: “You remember I used to say four years ago, 'We're gonna bring back the words, Merry Christmas.' We did, right? Merry Christmas. Those big department stores, they liked Happy New Year. I said, 'No, you can say them both, but you can't do one without the other.' Merry Christmas is back, you notice that right?”
pageContext.analysis: This claim is a strange favorite of the president's. There is no evidence that stores stopped using Merry Christmas in their advertising, were "ashamed" to do so or that any of this changed since Trump took office.
